channel.title: What the, f***

item.title: What the, f***
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

ok, i was making a new thread section in my server

thread section guild

all i did was add

if(playerInGuild && playerJoinGuild){
sM("You cant join another guild.");
guildUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}
}

thats my guild coding, guilds work…

but when i compiled it said

[code]
client.java 4896: wrong statement

guildUpdateRequired = true;
^
“;” needed

wtf???

basically i fixed this, but when i log on server…

this is what happens

you have joined guild 1
you cant join another guild
you cant join another guild
you cant join another guild

[it says that over and over]

even though i wasn’t trying to join a guild…

then when i fixed that i made mana construction…

so i did

if(p.mana > 3000 && currentActionTimer && actionInterval){
sM(“You dont have enough mana to make this.”);
} else
createServerObject(98607, temp.absX, temp.absY, temp.heightlevel);
sM(“You create a basic guild house.”);
}

i compiled this, and i got 1 error

it says that p.mana isn’t a statement

even though i have p.mana ike a bunch of times for spells and other construction stuff…

help?[/code]

Read full topic
